meanings.definition: A type of horse-drawn carriage with a closed body and an open driver's seat in front.
meanings.sent1: The broughams used to transport people in the olden days were elegant and comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The broughams lined up outside the palace, waiting to carry the royal family.
meanings.sent3: The horse pulling the brougham seemed to be in a hurry, trotting faster than usual.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced like a brougham through the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent5: The shiny black brougham stood out among the other carriages with its intricate design.
